_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
_source: OptionsKit Rolling Put Diagonal â€” 88% win rate, 20.2% CAGR, $10Kâ†’$19.3K (May 2022 - Dec 2025)
notes: QQQ weekly rolling put diagonal: sell 50Î” put 7 DTE, buy put 10Î” lower 10 DTE. Every Friday at 1:30 PM.
rationale: Proven weekly income strategy. 88% win rate over 83 trades. Avg $86/lot profit. Enter every Friday. Profit from theta differential between 7 and 10 DTE puts.

entry_conditions.iv_environment: VIX minimum 16 â€” need sufficient premium to sell

sell_leg.note: Use exact DTE (7 days), sell ATM-ish put

buy_leg.note: Buy put 10 delta points lower than sell leg, 10 DTE (3 days more than short)

entry_conditions.strike_offset: Use exact strike offsets (10 delta lower = roughly $10-15 lower on QQQ)
entry_conditions.notes: From OptionsKit backtest: QQQ rolling put diagonal. Open every Friday at 1:30 PM. Short leg 50Î” put 7 DTE, long leg -10Î” offset 10 DTE. VIX must be 16+. 88% win rate, $86 avg profit per lot. Cap profits, require two prices for profit target.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Profit target $1.50 per contract (cap profits early)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Net debit paid + strike width difference
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta differential â€” 7 DTE decays faster than 10 DTE put
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Put skew â€” OTM puts typically have higher IV, benefiting the spread

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” short 7 DTE put decays faster than long 10 DTE put
greeks_profile.vega: slightly positive â€” longer-dated leg has more vega
greeks_profile.delta: slightly negative (both puts, but short has higher delta)
greeks_profile.gamma: mixed â€” short leg has higher gamma near expiry

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: QQQ stays flat or rises slightly over the week. Short 7 DTE put decays to zero, long 10 DTE retains some value. Close at $1.50 profit. Repeat next Friday.
